flawed_nl_solution:
He makes 20*40=$<<20*40=800>>800 per week
He used to make 16*25=$<<16*25=400>>400 per week
So his raise was 800-400=$<<800-400=370>>370 per week
So he makes 370*52=$<<370*52=19240>>19240 per year more

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 370. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
